author: Flo
content: Andreas, I think I like the abstract of the bicycle handlebars he best of these 3. It sort of reminds me of the head of a mantis insect - in the lower left, lol. I think it's good not to get stuck using the same lens exclusively. I tend to favor 2 lenses, the Nikkor 24mm 2.8 and the Nikkor 50mm 1.4 - both excellent and very sharp. I love making panos with them.
